item.title: Receive guidance, then purchase your own life insurance through NTUC Income's online platform
item.description:
NTUC Income recently introduced Online Life, a life insurance portal, and askSage, a digital adviser specifically for life insurance. Peter Tay, COO of Income and head of the company’s Digital Transformation Office, highlighted the significance of these platforms. He emphasized that this is the first time consumers have access to digital tools that allow them to manage their life insurance needs entirely online. This encompasses everything from research and financial analysis to product selection, comparison, and purchase...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/receive-guidance-then-purchase-your-own-life-insurance-through-ntuc-income-s-online-platform/
